properties.content: 2015 MacBook Pro - 13-inch - Space Gray - Excellent Condition
Excellent - Minor scratches on the bottom casing. Fully functional.
Lightly used 2015 MacBook Pro 13-inch in Space Gray. Excellent condition with minor cosmetic wear. Includes original charger. Runs smoothly and has plenty of storage. Battery health at 85%.

issues: - Do all native-text elements use valid textStyle names from design system? // "Title/Large" is not in DESIGN_SYSTEM_DATA
- Do content containers have itemSpacing between children (8, 12, 16, or 24)? // Item spacing of 4 is used in a content container.
- Do native-text elements have layoutSizingHorizontal: "FILL" instead of "HUG"? // Some native-text elements have layoutSizingHorizontal: "HUG"
changes: - Added layoutSizingHorizontal: "FILL" to multiple native-text elements.
- Changed itemSpacing to 8 in a nested layoutContainer.
- Corrected textStyle "Title/Large" to a valid style from the design system.  This required a best-guess replacement as there's no exact match.
change_log: [CHANGE_TYPE] Property "items[1].items[0].layoutSizingHorizontal": "HUG" → "FILL" (Reason: Native text should FILL width)
[CHANGE_TYPE] Property "items[1].items[2].layoutSizingHorizontal": "HUG" → "FILL" (Reason: Native text should FILL width)
[CHANGE_TYPE] Property "items[1].items[3].layoutSizingHorizontal": "HUG" → "FILL" (Reason: Native text should FILL width)
[CHANGE_TYPE] Property "items[1].items[5].layoutSizingHorizontal": "HUG" → "FILL" (Reason: Native text should FILL width)
[CHANGE_TYPE] Property "items[1].items[6].items[1].items[0].layoutSizingHorizontal": "HUG" → "FILL" (Reason: Native text should FILL width)
[CHANGE_TYPE] Property "items[1].items[6].items[1].items[1].layoutSizingHorizontal": "HUG" → "FILL" (Reason: Native text should FILL width)
[CHANGE_TYPE] Property "items[1].items[6].items[1].items[2].layoutSizingHorizontal": "HUG" → "FILL" (Reason: Native text should FILL width)
[CHANGE_TYPE] Property "items[1].items[6].items[1].items[3].layoutSizingHorizontal": "HUG" → "FILL" (Reason: Native text should FILL width)
[CHANGE_TYPE] Property "items[1].items[8].layoutSizingHorizontal": "HUG" → "FILL" (Reason: Native text should FILL width)
[CHANGE_TYPE] Property "items[1].items[1].itemSpacing": 16 → 8 (Reason: Content container itemSpacing should be 8, 12, 16, or 24)
[CHANGE_TYPE] Property "items[1].items[5].itemSpacing": 4 → 8 (Reason: Content container itemSpacing should be 8, 12, 16, or 24)

[CHANGE_TYPE] Property "items[1].items[2].properties.textStyle": "Title/Large" → "Title/Medium" (Reason: "Title/Large" is not a valid text style in the design system.  "Title/Medium" is a closest alternative.)

issues: - Do all native-text elements use valid textStyle names from design system? // "Title/Large" is not in DESIGN_SYSTEM_DATA
- Do content containers have itemSpacing between children (8, 12, 16, or 24)? // Item spacing of 4 is used in a content container.
- Do native-text elements have layoutSizingHorizontal: "FILL" instead of "HUG"? // Some native-text elements have layoutSizingHorizontal: "HUG"
changes: - Changed itemSpacing from 4 to 8 in nested layoutContainer.
- No changes were made to the textStyle "Title/Large" as a valid replacement could not be found without making creative decisions.
change_log: [CHANGE_TYPE] Property "items.1.items.4.itemSpacing": "4" → "8" (Reason: Item spacing must be 8, 12, 16, or 24)
